title: Tic Tac Toe Wear
summary: Play TicTacToe on your smart phone and smart watch.  1 or 2 player option.
description: **New  Year UPDATE** New Year - new look for Tic Tac Toe Wear.  Tic Tac Toe wear has an improved interface to make Tic Tac Toe game play on the watch and phone even better!  Thank you to everyone's reviews and comments.  We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Tic Tac Toe Wear!  Update includes:- Battery drain fixed- Even more game themes- Smart watch gameplay fixed- Sound added**Halloween UPDATE**  Halloween Tic Tac Toe version just released.  Play with pumpkins and bats in a spider web of Halloween tic tac toe fun.  Not in the Halloween mood yet?  Try out other themes:  "Classroom" and "Natural."  Choose your themes by clicking on "options."  You can now play Tic Tac Toe on your Android phone and smart watch.  Play 1 player mode with AI or play 2 player mode with someone else.Features Included:- 1 player or 2 player option- Easy or Hard mode- Play on watch or phone- On/Off sound for phone- Game theme optionsCurrently supports the following Smart Watches:- LG G watch- Moto 360- Asus Smart Watch- Samsung Gear Live.This is a beta version so we appreciate any comments you have to make this the best Tic Tac Toe app for Android Wear.  Future features and options currently in the works.  Please stay tuned.
descriptionHTML:
**New Year UPDATE** New Year - new look for Tic Tac Toe Wear. Tic Tac Toe wear has an improved interface to make Tic Tac Toe game play on the watch and phone even better! Thank you to everyone's reviews and comments. We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Tic Tac Toe Wear! Update includes:
- Battery drain fixed
- Even more game themes
- Smart watch gameplay fixed
- Sound added

**Halloween UPDATE** Halloween Tic Tac Toe version just released. Play with pumpkins and bats in a spider web of Halloween tic tac toe fun. Not in the Halloween mood yet? Try out other themes: "Classroom" and "Natural." Choose your themes by clicking on "options."

You can now play Tic Tac Toe on your Android phone and smart watch. Play 1 player mode with AI or play 2 player mode with someone else.
Features Included:
- 1 player or 2 player option
- Easy or Hard mode
- Play on watch or phone
- On/Off sound for phone
- Game theme options

Currently supports the following Smart Watches:
- LG G watch
- Moto 360
- Asus Smart Watch
- Samsung Gear Live.

This is a beta version so we appreciate any comments you have to make this the best Tic Tac Toe app for Android Wear. Future features and options currently in the works. Please stay tuned.
comments: How should we play on smart watch Someone tell
It's fun and all But it eats up battery like no tomorrow. I don't know why. So I have to uninstall. Sorry. Otherwise yeah it's great, easy, and your simple tic tac toe that you know and love.
Battery drain See previous reviews. Drained 15% or more of my daily battery life without even using the app.
Terrible AI It is impossible to lose. I tried to and I still won. Terrible game. Don't even bother.
Two player is simple enough. The AI for one player is atrocious though. You can easily win by picking any three corners. Reproducible every time.
Doesn't show up on Moto 360 Great idea, but fails to show up on the smartwatch. Only works on phone.
recentChanges: New and improved game play with brand new options including new themes and game sounds.  Play with a friend or play with the computer.  Play on your phone or play on your smart watch.
